name: Kayak ordering service
description:
My brother (last summer) was really into buying a Kayak in order to boat in Ontario Lake next to Toronto.

However, the problem was that to keep a Kayak at your place (in the Toronto apartment), not an option.

It was really hard to find a user-friendly service to get into the sport of kayaking and understand the difference between all options. I hope someday it will be easier =)
